intro.title: Hello, my name is Denis Karazan
intro.description_1: I develop websites and web applications from scratch.
intro.description_2: I have experience managing a team and working as a team.
intro.description_3: I'm constantly developing in the field of web development.

job.more_info_1: Diagnosing, analyzing, repairing, and servicing industrial electronics. Ensuring uninterrupted operation of automated production lines. Diagnosing PLC Siemens controller programs. Reading and creating electrical schematics. Managing parameters of complex industrial equipment (flow meters, pressure transducers, frequency converters, etc.)
job.more_info_2: Technical maintenance, repair, and troubleshooting of the ice cream production line. Monitoring parameters, adjusting electronic components and equipment blocks, conducting test checks. Ensuring proper and uninterrupted operation of industrial Domino printers
job.more_info_3: CRM support and refactoring. Creating new layouts for website redesign. Developing a dedicated “Expenses” page with analytics for CRM. Efficient backlog cleanup for an external company. Working with the Mapbox interactive map. Supporting and developing widgets and components for a website builder. Embedding widgets on client websites. Maintaining CRM for website builder administration, and creating a mobile version of CRM for seamless post administration (similar to Tinder)
job.more_info_4: Working with the browser extension and frontend widgets. Creation of new microservices. Developing features for monitoring functions and optimizing queries in MongoDB. I actively sought and implemented solutions to enhance system resilience. Constructed Grafana dashboards through ETL processes. Optimized builds by reducing unnecessary code and replacing images. Updating projects (libraries, Webpack, Node.js, React, manifest). Reducing costs. Gathered metrics using Prometheus. Contributed in writing documentation and testing
job.more_info_5: Developed and successfully delivered one project from scratch. In four existing projects, I significantly improve functionality and add new features. Work on web and mobile development (React, React Native), implementing authentication, user management, controllers, and locations, as well as RTSP integration and deep links. Configure CI/CD pipelines for frontend auto-deploy. Develop and publish mobile applications to the App Store and Google Play. Optimize interfaces using Ant Design, fix bugs, and enhance product stability. Participate in architecture design and technology selection. Develop modules for low-level controllers and various industrial protocols (Modbus, Wiegand, etc.), ensuring integration of complex systems.

project.description_1: Creation of the entire landing page and site logic
project.description_2: Working with TypeScript and creating the entire application
project.description_3: Creating a backend, working with CRUD and creating the entire application
project.description_4: Final training project, teamwork and work with websockets
project.description_5: Working with the map and data on it and troubleshooting
project.description_6: Creating a page of costs and schedules for costs
project.description_7: Creating a widget for the site-builder and working with admin CRM
project.description_8: Working with the browser extension, maintaining and creating microservices
project.description_9: Development interface for managing smart home technologies for hotel rooms via a controller
project.description_10: Development and support of a web interface for managing and configuring the controller. Working with controller entities, algorithms and settings
project.description_11: Website development with admin panel. Connection and configuration of TimeTable
project.description_12: Development of authorization modules, rights, residents and employees. Ant Design setup
project.description_13: Developing a web interface for cloud-based smart home application setup
project.description_14: Developing a mobile application for a smart home using a controller

certificate.course_1: Faculty of Automated and Information Technologies
certificate.more_info_1: GSTU named after Pavel Sukhoi. Specialist / Engineer in radio electronics

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.success_text: Your message was successfully sent! I will reply to you shortly
contacts.failure_text: Something went wrong. Use the contacts below to contact me

footer.priority: Prior to collaboration, it's important to understand that as an experienced web developer, I cannot handle “urgent tasks” or participate in projects lasting less than one day. I am focused on developing strong partnerships rather than seeking quick and short-term gains

about.title: About me
about.description: I'm an honest and responsible person. I get along well with people. I treat my work with maximum efficiency. I'm engaged in self-study. My first encounter with JavaScript was in June 2020. For me, technology is a tool
